arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Paris lineup according to the press: Neves, Lee and Mayulu start

arts.ttl: Three talking points ahead of Barcelona vs PSG | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Barcelona and PSG face off in the UEFA Champions League on matchday two of the competition, and it will ultimately be the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys that will host the grandstand fixture. The game was initially expected to be held at the Spotify Camp Nou, but delays in the renovation saw the reopening pushed. arts.sum: Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain meet in a huge Champions League showdown this evening. arts.ttl: PSG midfied duo battling fitness issues before Barcelona tie
arts.sum: FC Barcelona and PSG are finally going to face off in their much-anticipated UEFA Champions League tie tonight, and this is inarguably going to be the most-viewed match of tonight’s round of matches in the European competition. However, both teams will be missing some of their important players. arts.ttl: PSG defender sends subtle warning to Barcelona prodigy – ‘Will be marked by the best left-back’
arts.sum: As Barcelona gear up for a crucial UEFA Champions League group stage clash with Paris Saint-Germain, Achraf Hakimi has tried to put the spotlight on teenage sensation Lamine Yamal. arts.ttl: Barcelona vs. PSG: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Injuries to key players shouldn’t spoil what should be a great occasion in Spain.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG: What time is the 2025-26 Champions League match and where to watch it in the United States?
arts.sum: On October 1, Hansi Flick's side will host Luis Enrique and his team for the second round of the Champions League. While Ousmane Dembele will not see minutes for PSG, and probably also Marquinhos and Warren Zaire-Emery are in doubt, as well as their starting midfielders Fabian Ruiz, Joao Neves and Vitinha all coming back from their respective injuries.
